Title: Narrative Deck Creation
Description: Build empirical value deck with methodology guardrails, limits, and ethics. ACCEPTANCE: Single-page summary complete; Deep dossier companion document; Reviewed by 2 external advisors; Version controlled and hash-stamped.

Title: FAQ Documentation
Description: Comprehensive FAQ covering methodology, limitations, and ethical stance. ACCEPTANCE: 25+ common questions addressed; Legal review passed; Published to secure portal; Version controlled.

Title: Host Script Development
Description: Create script for host-led presentation with founder off-stage. ACCEPTANCE: Full script with timing markers; Contingency prompts included; Q&A boundaries defined; Approved by all stakeholders.

Title: Rehearsal Execution
Description: Conduct 2 full rehearsals with live-switch testing. ACCEPTANCE: 2 rehearsals completed; Issues documented and resolved; Timing validated; Fallback procedures tested.

Title: Tier Matrix Definition
Description: Define Early Believer, Whale Table, Ghost Ticket tiers. ACCEPTANCE: Benefits clearly documented; Limits enforced technically; Refund policy published; Price tests documented.

Title: Soulbound Key Architecture
Description: Implement non-transferable key issuance, expiry, and revocation. ACCEPTANCE: Issuance logs captured; Gated access confirms membership; Revocation tested end-to-end; Audit trail complete.

Title: Payment Gateway Integration
Description: Integrate card, wire, and crypto payment methods. ACCEPTANCE: All 3 methods tested with live transactions; Invoicing automated; Zero reconciliation drift; Refund SLA defined and tested.

Title: Dunning Sequence Setup
Description: Implement payment retry and dunning workflows. ACCEPTANCE: 30/7/1 day reminders configured; Grace period logic implemented; Recovery rate tracking live; Escalation paths defined.

Title: Collateral Publisher Automation
Description: Versioned static site updates with checksum embed and rollback. ACCEPTANCE: Deploy pipeline automated; Checksum recorded per version; One-click rollback tested; CDN cache invalidation working.

Title: Event Asset Bundler
Description: Compile slides, videos, prompts with checksum and release tags. ACCEPTANCE: Bundle script automated; Checksums posted to Linear; Git release tags created; Asset inventory documented.

Title: Key Mint/Gate System
Description: Issuance script with retries, gating webhook, expiry crons. ACCEPTANCE: Mint succeeds with retry logic; Webhook validates membership; Expiry cron runs daily; Audit log to dashboard.

Title: Payment Webhooks Handler
Description: Success/fail tickets, refund automation with supervisor approval. ACCEPTANCE: Webhook captures all payment events; Auto-tickets created on failure; Refund requires approval; Dunning sequence triggers correctly.

Title: Compliance Guardrails Engine
Description: Scripts blocking claims beyond validated metrics. ACCEPTANCE: Regex + rule engine implemented; Redlines enforced in copy; Override requires evidence link; Audit trail for exceptions.
